mapper.sql: ID, QS, ZDDW, ZBDW, ZCJG, CBDW, XBDW, ZZDW
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_OPERATION_LOG (FLOW_ID, SYSTEM_NAME, OPERATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODULE, FUNCTION, RESULT) VALUES
(#{item.flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.function, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.result, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
